text: for most people using the internet
watching TV basically boils down to this
a laptop on your lap and a remote
control and hand channelsurfing these
two things TV and the internet have
remained entirely different universes of

electronics show in las vegas some of

of smaller ones are trying to change
that trying to figure out how to
converge those two experiences in a way
that will all buy and bring home to our

have one online is another there are
lots of different applications and so
everything is tied up into various

full experience together but in the last

TVs they're watching more online video
and social networking sites like

so this year many companies are
announcing products to bring the
Internet to your television the buzzword

television is playing up there and then

here was impressive with video
